gigabyte.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a unit for measuring computer information, equal to 1,024 megabytes, and used less exactly to mean a  billion bytes
gigabyte.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a unit of computer information equal to one thousand million BYTEs
gigabyte.translation[1].definitions[0].e: disks that can hold up to 96 gigabytes of data
